name: Scrapyd app (via pip, stable)
description: How to set up Scrapyd cluster on Heroku

TZ.description: Timezone of the app, get it via: python -c "import tzlocal; print(tzlocal.get_localzone())"

REDIS_HOST.description: Optional, see settings.py in the scrapy_redis_demo_project.zip

REDIS_PORT.description: Optional, see settings.py in the scrapy_redis_demo_project.zip

REDIS_PASSWORD.description: Optional, see settings.py in the scrapy_redis_demo_project.zip

PARSE_ROUND_INTERVAL.description: LogParser would sleep N seconds before starting next round of parsing, the default is 10.

ENABLE_TELNET.description: Whether to let LogParser collect Crawler.stats and Crawler.engine via telnet, the default is True.

VERBOSE.description: The default is False, set it to True to change the logging level of LogParser from WARNING to DEBUG.
